title: Man pleads guilty to drugging and sexually assaulting two boys at UK summer camp
description: Jon Ruben, 76, was arrested in July after eight children and one adult fell ill at Stathern Lodge in Leicestershire
content:
A 76-year-old man has pleaded guilty to drugging and sexually assaulting two boys, aged nine and 10, at a summer camp in Leicestershire.
Jon Ruben, 76, was arrested in July 2025 after eight children and one adult fell ill at Stathern Lodge.

title: Summer camp leader pleads guilty to drugging and sexually assaulting two boys
description: Jon Ruben, of Nottinghamshire, admitted sexual assault of a child under 13, assault of a child under 13 by penetration, eight counts of child cruelty, three counts of making indecent images of children and four drugs charges.
content:
